variations.template: When this creature enters, put <number:a_or_word> +1/+1 counter<number:plural:s> on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.
rts: When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.
When this creature enters, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.
When this creature enters, put three +1/+1 counters on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.

variations.template: When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following abilities until end of turn.
rts: When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following abilities until end of turn.

variations.template: When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following abilities until end of turn. Each backup ability triggers separately.
rts: When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following abilities until end of turn. Each backup ability triggers separately.
